import { useState } from "react" import "./body.css" const Body=()=>{ const [centerCardDisplay,setCenterCardDisplay] = useState(0) const cards = [ { front:"Step 1: Getting Started", back:"Create an account with us and join/create a group" }, { front:"Step 2: Scheduling a new meeting", back:"Create a new meeting. Enter a length and date range for the meeting" }, { front:"Step 3: Inviting your group members", back:"Invite your group members and wait for them to upload their availabilities" }, { front:"Step 4: Creating a schedule", back:"Once everyone finishes uploading, our algorithm will generate which slot best fit the group's schedule" } ] const changeSlide=(num)=>{ if(centerCardDisplay===0 && num===-1) return if(centerCardDisplay===cards.length-1 && num===1) return setCenterCardDisplay(prevCenterCardDisplay=>prevCenterCardDisplay+num) } return(

{centerCardDisplay>0 &&

{cards[centerCardDisplay-1].front}

{cards[centerCardDisplay-1].back}

}
